MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  LL18 postcode area of Rhyl, affecting properties in Pen y LLys, Dyserth Road, Bryn LLys and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:46PM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 4:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:20PM on 6th February 2021
